quote: As my heart begins to return to normal, I look down at -- and feel such an intense rush of love and relief it takes my breath away. ""I will never let you put of my sight again,"" I promise --
quote_letters: AS MY HEART BEGINS TO RETURN TO NORMAL I LOOK DOWN AT -- AND FEEL SUCH AN INTENSE RUSH OF LOVE AND RELIEF IT TAKES MY BREATH AWAY I WILL NEVER LET YOU PUT OF MY SIGHT AGAIN I PROMISE --
